mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SMALL_GROUP ( BOARD_NO, SMALL_LOCATION, RECRUIT_NO, KAKAO_LINK ) VALUES( #{boardNo}, #{smallLocation}, #{recruitNo}, #{kakaoLink} )
mapper.select: SELECT SG.BOARD_NO, SG.SMALL_LOCATION, SG.RECRUIT_NO, M.NICK_NAME, B.TITLE, B.CREATE_DATE FROM SMALL_GROUP SG LEFT JOIN BOARD B ON SG.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON B.USER_NO = M.USER_NO WHERE B.CATEGORY_U_NO = 7 AND B.STATUS= 'Y' ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT B.BOARD_NO, SG.SMALL_LOCATION, SG.RECRUIT_NO, M.NICK_NAME, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, M.USER_NO, SG.KAKAO_LINK FROM SMALL_GROUP SG LEFT JOIN BOARD B ON SG.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON B.USER_NO = M.USER_NO WHERE B.CATEGORY_U_NO = 7 AND B.BOARD_NO= #{boardNo}

SELECT SG.BOARD_NO, SG.SMALL_LOCATION, SG.RECRUIT_NO, M.NICK_NAME, B.TITLE, B.CREATE_DATE FROM SMALL_GROUP SG LEFT JOIN BOARD B ON SG.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON B.USER_NO = M.USER_NO WHERE B.CATEGORY_U_NO = 7 AND B.STATUS= 'Y' ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SMALL_GROUP JOIN BOARD B USING(BOARD_NO) WHERE B.STATUS= 'Y'
